explains: v. （使）变紧；绷紧；（使）（身体的某一部位）变得僵硬；加强（规则、法律等）；（比赛）变得激烈（tighten 的现在分词）
n. （身体的）绷紧，僵直；（规则、法律等的）加强
wordGroup: tightening torque [化]拧紧力矩，拉紧转矩
belt tightening n. 勒紧裤腰带；紧缩预算，省吃俭用

sentences.en: The new measures are aimed at tightening existing sanctions.
sentences.cn: 这些新措施旨在加强现行的制裁。

sentences.en: The anchorman flung his whole weight back, tightening the rope.
sentences.cn: 这位排尾压阵队员用尽全部的力气往后拽，把绳子拉紧。

sentences.en: The government has in the past given qualified support to the idea of tightening the legislation.
sentences.cn: 政府过去对加强立法的观点给予了有保留的支持。
